answers.answer: Feeling the same way.. I'm due Nov 3 and it seems like it's taking forever.  I have gestational diabetes and it's been hell.  Non stop doctor appointments and I have a 2yr old that in constantly getting into stuff and husband that complains that we can't be intimate cause my whole body hurts.

Oh man the gd must be horrible. I failed my first hour test then passed the god awful 3 hour test. Just the thought of sex makes me hurt all over. I wanna find a salon or somewhere that does body massages and have the tables with the face and belly whole. Lol
Yea.. I need a whole body massage after having baby and maybe have a drink. Lol im just hoping that my lil girl decides to be here soon and not wait til nov 3rd .

question: Not really a question just a vent. Im so big and tired and i fear for hubby if i dont got into labor sooner rather than later the poor guy is gonna have a melt down. I know i shouldnt but i feel like alls i do is yell at him constantly and complain but its like he doesnt understand how tired i am! Im so sore and still working 6 days a week come home cook and clean and chase around our one yr old and he thinks after all that i wanna have sex. Alls i want is a hot shower my feet and back rubbed. Is that to much to ask?! Today i finally broke down and cried and im so worried i wont be able to handle two babies and i just feel depressed from thinking that. Iv got so many emotions goin on i feel like im ready to have a break down :( ughhh nov 5th will you ever get here.
title: Is it time yet?!?! :(
